name: Light Up Your Dreams
lyric:
林一峰 - Light Up Your Dreams

曲/词/编/监：林一峰

stars are twinkling in your eyes
echoing in my mind
chasing rainbows through the desert
we're two of a kind

will you trade a wishing well
for a shooting star
close your eyes and taste the time
then you'll know who you are

lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai light up your dreams
elephant's an idea
things are not what they seem
when you're lonely
think of a star
you'll see me in your dreams

lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai light up your dreams
elephant's an idea things are not what they seem
lai lai lai lai lai lai lai lai light up your dreams
elephant's an idea you should know what i mean
when you're lonely
look up the sky
think of the laughters
think of the raindrops
think of a shooting star
for you and me
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 Sk8errabbit 编辑于2019-09-11 15:10

comments.brief:
一峰好可爱

来自iPhone客户端
